name: Display Stock Status For Woocommerce
author: silverplugins217

sections.description:
Display Stock Status For Woocommerce plugin is used to write the custom stock status with different colors for each woocommerce product or globally, let users to know exact stock status names in product details page.

The goal of this plugin is to show the “stock quantity” under each product in the shop, category and archive pages (wherever there is a loop).

WITH THE DISPLAY STOCK STATUS FOR WOOCOMMERCE YOU CAN:

  • Always Show Stock
  • Stock Position
  • In stock
  • Available on backorder
  • (can be backordered)
  • Out Of Stock
  • In Stock Color
  • In Stock Background Color
  • Out Of Stock Color
  • Out Of Stock Background Color
  • Display Icon

CONTRIBUTE AND TRANSLATE

Display Stock Status For Woocommerce is translated into multiple languages Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and many more. Help localize Woocommerce even further by adding your locale Language. Click Here
sections.faq:
How to Use Display Stock Status For Woocommerce

Display Stock Status For Woocommerce use to custom text add in shop page, category and archive pages.
